summary: This document contains an interview with ROBERT GLENN THOMPSON regarding his knowledge of individuals associated with the CIA and Army Intelligence in Berlin, including WILLIAM K. HARVEY and CLARK JUNG. THOMPSON was interviewed about his time with OSI, Berlin, and his interactions with a Soviet principal named STEVEN.
title: Interview with ROBERT GLENN THOMPSON regarding CIA and Army Intelligence Personnel in Berlin
locations_mentioned: Bay Shore, Long Island, New York
